creditline: The Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas and gift of Robert T. Coffland in memory of Mary Hunt Kahlenberg
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: rectangular panel; golden brown with black designs; hard fold widthwise separating two different design motifs; one area has three concentric circles with radiating triangles, with stars and bowtie shapes; other area has striped triangles and rectangles with lines connecting some forms
title: Barkcloth panel
